p: In conclusion, this study has shown for the first time that there is evidence that Arctic sea ice loss contributes to the seasonal evolution of the circulation response to climate change in the CMIP5 ensemble. New experiments planned for the CFMIP‚ÄêCMIP6 project (Webb et al., 2017) will enable to more directly evaluate the role of sea ice loss in a multimodel ensemble and thus to test these findings.
